DescriptionData.Title: Face Painting Book of Cats - Murad
DescriptionData.Description: The Face Painting Book of Cats (the second in the series) by Marcella "MamaClown" Murad, has 50 original extraordinary yet simple cat face painting designs. Marcela Murad is one of the pioneers in the face painting world. Included in this amazing book is easy step-by step instructions that make kitty cat face painting a snap, from simple cat face painting to advanced cat face painting designs created by Murad, Jinny, Mark Reid, Sandy Hill, etc.. The Face Painting Book of Cats includes various tips to make cat face painting for kids fun and easy. 1/2 Size, Soft Cover, Photo/illustrated, Full Color, 56 Pages.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Marcella Murad's 2nd book of Cat Face Painting designs
Easy to follow, step by step instructions included
